revised_title: Investigations in Absolute Mercurial Thermometry and Capillarity Effects
tldr: The author conducts a series of experiments to compare six thermometers and determine the effects of capillarity and pressure on their readings. The study focuses on absolute mercurial thermometry and provides insights into the consistency and accuracy of various thermometer types, including English flint glass, French'verre dur', and Jena normal glass thermometers.
